concept.title: Can I add attributes to specific element types?
concept.shortdesc: No, you can only define global attributes, specialized either from @base or @props.

conbody.p: As of DITA 1.2, there is no mechanism for defining new attributes for specific element types. The problem is that there is no DITA-defined syntax for declaring a given attribute as being an attribute that should be recognized as such by a DITA-aware processor and not just some random attribute that was allowed in error (as the DITA architecture otherwise does not allow non-DITA-defined attributes.
Providing this ability is a booked feature request for DITA.
